tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WineTastingNotes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  expert_name VARCHAR(50),
  wine_name VARCHAR(50),
  region VARCHAR(50),
  vintage_year INT,
  flavor_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE wine_tasting_notes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    expert_name STRING,
    wine_name STRING,
    vintage INT,
    region STRING,
    tasting_notes STRING
);

CREATE TABLE wine_tasting_notes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  expert_name VARCHAR(50),
  vintage_year INT,
  wine_name VARCHAR(100),
  tasting_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE expert_ratings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  expert_id INT,
  wine_id INT,
  rating DECIMAL(3, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE common_themes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  theme_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tasting_notes ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    wine_id INT, 
    expert_id INT, 
    note TEXT, 
    rating INT 
);

CREATE TABLE expert_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expert_name VARCHAR(50),
    wine_name VARCHAR(100),
    vintage INT,
    region VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT,
    notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE common_themes (
    theme_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    theme_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE expert_preferences (
    pref_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expert_name VARCHAR(50),
    theme_id INT,
    preference_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE wine_details (
    wine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_name VARCHAR(100),
    vintage INT,
    region VARCHAR(50),
    type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE theme_notes (
    note_id INT,
    theme_id INT
)
